mapper.select: select cls.cid, course.cname as name, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour, count(course.cid) as class_num from cls join course join teacher join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and departmet.did = teacher.did and course.did = departmet.did where teacher.tid = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=CHAR} group by course.cid limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{n,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select cls.cid, course.cname as name, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour, count(course.cid) as class_num from cls join course join teacher join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and departmet.did = teacher.did and course.did = departmet.did where teacher.tid = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=CHAR} and (course.cid = #{key,jdbcType=CHAR} or course.cname like '%${key}%') group by course.cid

select cls.cid, cls.clsid, cls.term, course.cname as name, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour, cls.capacity, cls.chose_num from cls join course join teacher join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and course.did = departmet.did where teacher.tid = #{tid,jdbcType=CHAR} limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{n,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select stu_cls.sid as stuid, s.sname as name, stu_cls.usual_grade, stu_cls.final_grade from stu_cls join student s on stu_cls.sid = s.sid where stu_cls.clsid = #{clsid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by stu_cls.final_grade desc

select cls.cid, course.cname as course, teacher.tname as teacher, schedule.day, schedule.start_session, schedule.end_session, schedule.address from cls join course join teacher join schedule on cls.clsid = schedule.clsid and cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid where teacher.tid = #{tid,jdbcType=CHAR} and schedule.start_week <= #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER} and schedule.end_week >= #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by schedule.start_session
